name: Prison Breaks
description: Mass prison breaks release dangerous criminals

failure.msg: Mass prison break releases many criminals
manualEffects: Convert half of your imprisoned unrest to regular unrest (round down)
Mark your highest tier justice structure as damaged

criticalFailure.msg: Complete prison break releases all criminals and destroys your justice system
manualEffects: Convert ALL of your imprisoned unrest to regular unrest
Reduce your highest tier justice structure's tier by one and mark it as damaged. If the tier is reduced to zero, remove it entirely
